data.name: Monstrum - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The soundtrack to Team Junkfish's survival horror labyrinth Monstrum in MP3 & FLAC format. Created by Jaime Cross

1. Menu Theme (01:52)

2. Wandering Alone at Night on a Ship (04:32)

3. The Brute (02:26)

4. Hiding From The Brute (02:34)

5. The Brute Stalks The Halls (04:32)

6. The Hunter (03:00)

7. Hiding From The Hunter (02:56)

8. Out of Sight, Out of Mind (04:56)

9. The Fiend (02:40)

10. Hiding From The Fiend (02:40)

11. These Halls Breathe Evil (02:52)

12. Clutch Control OST Main Theme (04:15)

13. Clutch Control OST Jimmy Peddles Rodrigues' Theme (03:12)

14. Clutch Control OST Miles Speedman's Theme (03:38)

15. Clutch Control OST Bad Happenings Theme (04:00)

Songs will be placed in a subfolder of your Monstrum Steam install directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Monstrum\

data.short_description: The soundtrack to Team Junkfish's survival horror labyrinth Monstrum in MP3 & FLAC format. Created by Jaime Cross 1. Menu Theme (01:52) 2. Wandering Alone at Night on a Ship (04:32) 3. The Brute (02:26) 4. Hiding From The Brute (02:34) 5. The Brute Stalks The Halls (04:32) 6. The Hunter (03:00) 7. Hiding From The Hunter (02:56) 8.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 - 32 bit
  • Процессор: Intel / AMD - 2.4 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Nvidia GTX 285 / ATI Radeon HD 4870 X2 - 1GB (Direct x 9.0c / 10 / 11)
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0c
  • Место на диске: 400 MB
  • Дополнительно: These are the same specification as Monstrum game and as such are higher than actually required to listen to the soundtrack alone.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 / 8 - 64 bit
  • Процессор: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX-6 - 3.0+ GHz (Quad Core)
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Nvidia GTX 560 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 6970 - 1GB (Direct x 11)
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Место на диске: 400 MB
